attributes.action: start Friday Eve, a new public holiday celebrating the day before Friday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Friday Eve will involve the following:

Takes place every Thursday.
Workplaces must close 1 hour earlier than usual.
Employees will still be paid for this hour.
Pubs/Bars/Clubs will run an extra happy hour.
Friday Eve should be on all calenders.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
